sqlMap.statement: SELECT IBW.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,IBW.INTFC_CRAT_DT ,IBW.INTFC_CPO_ORD_NUM ,IBW.INTFC_CPO_ORD_DT ,IBW.INTFC_PRT_MDSE_CD ,IBW.PRT_SIZE_TXT ,IBW.CINC_GLBL_WH_CD ,IBW.CINC_RCV_GLBL_WH_CD ,IBW.CINC_BILL_TO_GLBL_CMPY_CD ,IBW.CINC_GLBL_CMPY_CATG_CD ,IBW.INTFC_SELL_TO_CUST_CD ,IBW.INTFC_ORD_QTY_SGN_TXT ,IBW.INTFC_ORD_QTY ,IBW.INTFC_BO_QTY_SGN_TXT ,IBW.INTFC_BO_QTY ,IBW.INTFC_RSVD_BO_QTY_SGN_TXT ,IBW.INTFC_RSVD_BO_QTY ,IBW.INTFC_EXPD_SHIP_DT ,IBW.CINC_SHIP_TO_GLBL_CMPY_CD ,IBW.CINC_GLBL_SHPG_METH_CD ,IBW.CINC_GLBL_ORD_CATG_CD ,IBW.PRT_CHRG_IND ,IBW.PRT_EMER_ORD_IND ,IBW.INTFC_CRAT_DT FROM INTFC_BO_WRK IBW WHERE IBW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND IBW.INTFC_CRAT_DT = #slsDt# AND IBW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT IF.GLBL_CMPY_3_CD FROM NWAI2420_01 IF WHERE IF.GLBL_CMPY_3_CD = IBW.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND IF.INTFC_CRAT_DT = IBW.INTFC_CRAT_DT AND IF.INTFC_CPO_ORD_NUM = IBW.INTFC_CPO_ORD_NUM AND IF.INTFC_CPO_ORD_DT = IBW.INTFC_CPO_ORD_DT AND IF.INTFC_PRT_MDSE_CD = IBW.INTFC_PRT_MDSE_CD AND IF.PRT_SIZE_TXT = IBW.PRT_SIZE_TXT AND IF.CINC_GLBL_SHPG_METH_CD = IBW.CINC_GLBL_SHPG_METH_CD AND IF.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ) ORDER BY IBW.INTFC_CPO_ORD_NUM
